exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x, y : V eps : posreal H : norm (minus y x) < eps Unable to unify "(let (ball, _, _, _) := UniformSpace.class V in ball) ?M2435 ?M2437 ?M2436" with "norm (minus x y) < eps".

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x, y : V eps : posreal H : norm (minus y x) < eps Unable to unify "NormedModule.norm ?M2435 ?M2436 ?M2437 (minus ?M2439 ?M2438) < NormedModule.norm_factor ?M2435 ?M2436 ?M2437 * ?M2440" with "norm (minus x y) < eps".
In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x, y : V eps : posreal H : norm (minus y x) < eps Unable to unify "norm (minus x ?M2435) < norm_factor * ?M2437" with "norm (minus x y) < eps".
In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x, y : V eps : posreal H : norm (minus y x) < eps Unable to unify "norm (minus y x) < eps" with "norm (minus x y) < eps".

original: intros x y eps H. unfold ball_norm in H. unfold ball_norm. apply norm_compat1. apply NormedModule.ax4. apply norm_compat2 with (y := x). apply H.
